Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Fort Wayne, IN Thursday, March 26, 2015
Please join us on Thursday, March 26, 2015 when Dan Winchester, Director of Performance Management, will conduct a Pricing and Appraisal Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for General Managers, Sales Managers, and Buyers.
Workshop Overview:
- Ensure that every car in your inventory is priced in the perfect position to achieve maximum exposure to buyers - Know precisely how much more you can ask for a vehicle while maintaining your rank at the head of the pack and maximize your profit potential - Analyze Market Days Supply and know how hot or not a car is in your market - Develop a fast and profitable exit strategy before buying a vehicle - Know exactly what getting out of a vehicle means in terms of your dealership’s profit goals – before you get in.
Location: Courtyard Fort Wayne Downtown at Grand Wayne Convention Center 1150 South Harrison Street Fort Wayne, IN 46802 (260) 490-3629
Agenda Overview: 8:00am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 8:30am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register <http://go.vauto.com/Fort-Wayne-March-26.html> your attendees by March 19th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Fort Wayne Downtown at Grand Wayne Convention Center, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/fwadt-courtyard-fort-wayne-downtown-at-grand-wayne-convention-center/> or call the hotel directly at (260) 490-3629.
We hope to see you there! -vAuto Marketing
